nodes.text: This man was the father of the famous Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi. His family also included his wife and a son who Obi-Wan believed to be his brother due to force visions, Owen, however it turns out that Owen was actually Owen Lars, Luke Skywalker's uncle.
Obi-Wan Kenobi's father was first seen in a flashback in Jedi Apprentice: The Hidden Past, the third book of the young readers series Jedi Apprentice, written by Jude Watson.
